name: 2nd world congress on Smart Material and Material Science
content: Lexis Meetings is a global leader in producing high-quality conferences, meetings, workshops, and symposia all told major fields of science, technology, and medicine. "2nd World Congress on Smart Material and Material Science (WCSM-2021)" organized Webinar during July21-22, 2021\. The Purpose of 2 days conference is to bring together Researchers and bright minds from around the Globe who are interested in Exploring the links and New Happening on material science. Theme: Emerging trends in Smart Materials and Nanotechnology
